meanings.sent1: After the intense fight, the boxer was kayoed and couldn't get up.
meanings.sent2: The kayoed wrestler lay motionless on the mat.
meanings.sent3: The kayoed team accepted their defeat with grace.
meanings.sent4: The kayoed dreams of victory faded into darkness.
meanings.sent5: The kayoed opponent was out cold for minutes.

meanings.definition: To be knocked out or defeated in a boxing match.
meanings.sent1: In the final round, he kayoed his opponent with a powerful punch.
meanings.sent2: The champion kayoed his rival in just seconds.
meanings.sent3: The boxer kayoed his way to the top, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His quick moves kayoed his opponent before they could react.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as he kayoed his way to victory.
